alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 5:47PM MST until August 18 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MST FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 547 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near McDowell Mountain Park, or 7 miles northeast of Scottsdale, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, Cave Creek, Carefree, McDowell Mountain Park, Desert Mountain, Camp Creek and Horseshoe Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
